metadata.title: CVE-2014-9273 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: lib/handle.c in Hivex before 1.3.11 allows local users to execute arbitrarycode and gain privileges via a small hive files, which triggers anout-of-bounds read or write.

criterions.comment: hivex: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
